sn51.27:1.2: Atha kho ayasma anando yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma anando bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn51.27:2.1: “Katama nu kho, bhante, iddhi, katamo iddhipado, katama iddhipadabhavana, katama iddhipadabhavanagamini patipada”ti?
sn51.27:2.2: “Idhananda, bhikkhu anekavihitam iddhividham paccanubhoti—ekopi hutva bahudha hoti, bahudhapi hutva eko hoti …pe… yava brahmalokapi kayena vasam vatteti—
sn51.27:3.2: Yo, ananda, maggo ya patipada iddhilabhaya iddhipatilabhaya samvattati—
